sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-text-field
      v-model="title"
      label="Title"
      outlined
      filled
      clearable
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-textarea
      v-model="body"
      filled
      outlined
    ></v-textarea>
    <v-btn color="teal lighten-1" dark> Save </v-btn>
  </v-container>
  
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "NotesList",

  data: function () {
    return {
      selectedItem: 1,
      note: null,
    };
  },

  methods: {
    getNotes: function () {
      axios
        .get("http://localhost:3000/notes/:id")
        .then((response) => (this.notes = response.data));
    },
  },

  mounted: function () {
    this.getNotes();
  },
};
</script>
